result.name: raw-data-from-synchrotron-x-ray-diffraction-mhz-acoustic-velocity-and-inelastic-neutron-scatter
result.notes: Experimental data originating from the NERC IRF project entitled "Calcium perovskite: the forgotten mantle phase". Data consists of: - large volume press synchrotron XRD ± ultrasonic velocity measurements (ID06-LVP ESRF) - diamond anvil cell XRD data (I15 Diamond) - Neutron Inelastic scattering data (IN8 ILL) - D111 deformation experiment XRD and imaging from (NE07 PF-AR, KEK)

organization.name: british-geological-survey

result.title: Raw data from synchrotron X-ray diffraction, MHz acoustic velocity and Inelastic Neutron Scattering measurements of CaSiO3-CaTiO3 perovskite minerals at mantle conditions
